title: Bus crashes into medical centre in Ryde, Sydney
description: Multiple people have been injured after a bus crashed into the front of a medical centre at Ryde in Sydney's north. Three people were rushed to hospital, police saying it's a miracle the driver wasn't killed. #bus #crash #ryde #sydney #nswpolice
